uml2rca.adaptation.dependency

Class DependencyToAssociationAdaptation

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.adaptation.AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>
        • uml2rca.adaptation.dependency.DependencyToAssociationAdaptation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>

    public class DependencyToAssociationAdaptation
extends AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency,java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>>
    a DependencyToAssociationAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML dependency into an equivalent list of general associations.

    The adaptation consists of creating a list of equivalent target general associations between each client and each supplier of the source dependency, having each the same owning package as the source dependency.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractAdaptation, Dependency, Association

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class core.transformation.AbstractTransformation

        source, target

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DependencyToAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
      Creates a dependency to association adaptation having source as its source dependency to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the list of equivalent target general associations between each client and each supplier of the source dependency, and cleans the post-adaptation residues.

      Creates a general binary association from source between one of its clients and one of its suppliers, having the same owning package as it
      private void initTargetAssociationMemberEnd(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association association, org.eclipse.uml2.uml.NamedElement dependencyMember, boolean isNavigable)
      Creates a member end for the provided general association, from the original dependency member, whose navigablity is defined by isNavigable
      void postTransform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
      Removes the source dependency from the model once its equivalent target general associations have been created and added to the model to replace it.
      java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association> transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
      Creates a list of equivalent target unidirectional general associations between each client and each supplier of the source dependency to adapt, having each the same owning package as it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DependencyToAssociationAdaptation

        public DependencyToAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
                                  throws NotATypeException
        Creates a dependency to association adaptation having source as its source dependency to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the list of equivalent target general associations between each client and each supplier of the source dependency, and cleans the post-adaptation residues.
        Parameters:
        source - the source dependency to adapt.
        Throws:
        NotATypeException - if the provided source dependency has a client or a supplier that is not a typed element

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public java.util.List<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association> transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
        Creates a list of equivalent target unidirectional general associations between each client and each supplier of the source dependency to adapt, having each the same owning package as it.
        Parameters:
        source - the source model element to transform.
        Returns:
        the target model element.

      • initTargetAssociation

        private org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association initTargetAssociation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source,
                                                               org.eclipse.uml2.uml.NamedElement client,
                                                               org.eclipse.uml2.uml.NamedElement supplier)
        Creates a general binary association from source between one of its clients and one of its suppliers, having the same owning package as it
        Parameters:
        source - the source dependency to adapt
        client - one of the clients of source
        supplier - one of the suppliers of source
        Returns:
        a general binary association from source between one of its clients and one of its suppliers, having the same owning package as it

      • initTargetAssociationMemberEnd

        private void initTargetAssociationMemberEnd(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association association,
                                            org.eclipse.uml2.uml.NamedElement dependencyMember,
                                            boolean isNavigable)
        Creates a member end for the provided general association, from the original dependency member, whose navigablity is defined by isNavigable
        Parameters:
        association - the general association for which this method creates a member end
        dependencyMember - the original dependency member from which the member end of the general association will be created
        isNavigable - a value determining whether the created general association member end is navigable or not

      • postTransform

        public void postTransform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Dependency source)
        Removes the source dependency from the model once its equivalent target general associations have been created and added to the model to replace it.
        Parameters:
        source - the source model element to transform.
